subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chicagoans vividly remember Steve Bartman, the fan who deflected a foul ball in 2003. Some wonder whether an appearance by Bartman would reopen wounds or lift Chicago’s curse.
snippet: Chicagoans vividly remember Steve Bartman, the fan who deflected a foul ball in 2003. Some wonder whether an appearance by Bartman would reopen wounds or lift Chicago’s curse.
